ontoLib.creator: Creator
ontoLib.noOntoCreate: Click|【Create ontology】|button to create an ontology
ontoLib.deleteTitle: Are you sure to delete the ontology?
ontoLib.deleteContent: Once the ontology is deleted, it cannot be retrieved. Please exercise caution when performing this operation!
ontoLib.importFileNumSizeLimit: Only 1 file can be uploaded, and its size should not exceed 10M
ontoLib.importSampleFile: Click to download|【sample  xlsx template】|【sample  json template】|
ontoLib.nodeTips: The name displayed on the canvas, equal to the entity class name by default
ontoLib.edgeTips: The name displayed on the canvas, equal to the relationship class name by default
ontoLib.quitTitle: Are you sure you want to exit the current operation?
ontoLib.quitContent: The current content has not been saved, and the configured content will not be restored after exiting, please operate with caution.
ontoLib.autoSave: The ontology has been automatically saved as a draft
ontoLib.draftTips: The content of the draft cannot be cited

errInfo.eLettersNumber_: Only uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers and underscores are supported
errInfo.ceLettersNumber_: Only Chinese and English, numbers and underscores are supported
errInfo.ceLettersNumber: Only Chinese, English and numbers are supported
errInfo.ceLettersNumberSymbols: Only Chinese and English, numbers and special symbols on the keyboard are supported
errInfo.needDefaultProperty: There must be a default display property
errInfo.aNameHas: The attribute name already exists, please modify it
errInfo.aDNameHas: The show name already exists, please modify it
errInfo.oneMerge: Select at least one fusion attribute
errInfo.sNodeErr: There are configuration errors in entity class "Details" and "Attributes" sections, please modify them
errInfo.sEdgeErr: There are configuration errors in relationship class "Details" and "Attributes" sections, please modify them
errInfo.sOneNodeErr: There is {b} configuration error in entity class {a} section
errInfo.sOneEdgeErr: There is {b} configuration error in relationship class {a} section
errInfo.attrSynonymsSame: The attribute synonym already exists, please modify it
errInfo.copyErr: The relationship class name is already occupied by the model, please modify it
errInfo.attrSynonymsOrDescribeErr: The synonym or description configuration error in this attribute, please modify it
errInfo.repeatErr: The name is already occupied by the model, please modify it
errInfo.vectorNotConfig: Vector service is not configured, the vector index will be missing after the build, please contact the administrator to check the configuration file
errInfo.vectorConfigError: Vector service configuration anomaly, the vector index will be missing after the build, please contact the administrator to check the configuration file
errInfo.entityEmptyTip: Add at least one entity class

canvasOnto.indexSettingTip: After building, the attributes indexed will be available for retrieving and querying
canvasOnto.sureToDeleteAttr: Are you sure to delete it?

canvasEdge.sureToDelete: Are you sure to delete it?
canvasEdge.edgeDisplayPlaceHold: Please enter relationship class show name

ontoLib.nodeEdgeTips: If the integration of any entity class/relationship class is changed Platform attribute, only supports full construction of knowledge graph
